page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: The work of compiling the information for this area was carried out by the children of The Cathedral Primary and Moorside Junior schools, Lancaster. The Cathedral Primary School is a Roman Catholic Primary school near the city centre and has about 160 pupils between the ages of 5 and 11.The texts marked (C) were compiled by a class of Top Junior children(aged 10/11) Moorside Junior School is a County Junior school with about 350 children between the ages of 7 and 11. It is situated in the Bowerham area of the city. The texts marked (M) were compiled by some of their Top Junior children. The research was carried out and the texts drafted during the Summer and Autumn of 1985. We have done our best to ensure the completeness and accuracy of the data.
